dialogue.text:
One day, the Guild Master summoned you in a hurry.

As you stepped into the office, he lifted his gaze from a mountain of paperwork, set his pen down, and looked at you with an expression both serious and relaxed.

dialogue.name: Guild Master
dialogue.text: Oh, rookie… good. You’re just in time. The Guild Factions have been looking for extra hands.
He gestured toward a mission board lined with the emblems of all six Factions, each waiting for someone brave enough to take on their tasks.

dialogue.name: Guild Master
dialogue.text:
Did you know that besides the main Seeker Guild, there are also smaller, specialized Factions?

Pretty diverse, right? That’s the very mechanism that keeps the Puff Kingdom running.

dialogue.name: Guild Master
dialogue.text: Each one has its own role, some go out to battle monsters, some stay in greenhouses growing herbs, and some work in kitchens preparing meals for travellers like us!
He gave you a knowing half-smile, the kind someone makes when they’re fully aware they’re sending you straight into chaos.

dialogue.name: Guild Master
dialogue.text: If you still can’t decide… just pick whichever Faction leader you like the most. Good luck out there!
Botanist Faction

dialogue.name: Selene
dialogue.text:
Did you know… every plant has a voice of its own?
You just need a calm heart to hear it.

dialogue.name: Selene
dialogue.text: Our work is to tend to the world — to heal both the wounds we can see, and the ones hidden deep within.

Selene, Botanist Master
A noble young lady from a wealthy family who chose to become a Seeker in order to find the legendary Dragon Mandrake, said to be born from a dragon’s breath.

Gifted with an extraordinary, almost genius-level memory, she is nevertheless shy and terrible at talking to people, leading many to mistakenly assume she’s an arrogant rich girl.

Quest: To help the guild, choose one of the options below to draw or write.

  • Research magical herbs and components to create potions, healing medicine, and antidotes.
  • Cultivate rare plants and maintain the guild’s research garden.
  • Provide emergency medical aid to both Seekers and Puffs.
  • Restore natural areas affected by magic or disasters.
  • Discover and study new plant species.

dialogue.name: Guild Master
dialogue.text:
And of course… this isn’t all there is to the Puff Kingdom. There are countless small other guilds not listed here, as well as independent travellers who choose to walk their own path.

Their stories… We’ll slowly introduce you to it in time.

dialogue.name: Guild Master
dialogue.text: Joining a Guild Faction isn’t a one-time choice; you’re free to assist multiple guilds as you wish!  Each mission will help you grow in your own unique way.

dialogue.name: Guild Master
dialogue.text: Train and refine yourself as much as your Seeker’s heart can lead you…  And may luck be on your side!
Fighter Faction

dialogue.name: Noct
dialogue.text: Remember this, Seeker: true strength begins with a heart that refuses to give up!

Noct, Fighter Master
A former young knight and the sole survivor of a massive war. Much of his lineage and background remains shrouded in mystery.

Despite his age, he has survived countless battlefields, wielding a blade so sharp it’s as if he can foresee attacks. Normally friendly and cheerful, but he has only one taboo— never mention his height.

Quest: To help the guild, choose one of the options below to draw or write.

  • Carry out field operations.
  • Battle against monsters.
  • Participate in rescue and evacuation missions during emergencies.
  • Protect and escort other Seekers during expeditions.
  • Train and mentor fellow Seekers in combat.
  • Handle urgent missions, such as searching for missing persons.

Animal Faction

dialogue.name: Faluna
dialogue.text: Welcome, Seeker! Careful not to step on that little one’s tail!

dialogue.name: Faluna
dialogue.text: Every living being… has its own reasons. We just have to listen well enough to understand.

Faluna, Animal Master
A woman who has been able to sense animals' emotions since childhood, with a long-held dream of one day she’d communicating with them.

She adores Pufflings, to the point that sometimes she knows more about them than the Puff themselves.

While clumsy and overly kind, she becomes exceptionally serious when it comes to living creatures.

Quest: To help the guild, choose one of the options below to draw or write.

  • Study the behaviour of Pufflings and other magical creatures.
  • Care for and nurture young Puffs, and research Puff Colony behaviour.
  • Create safe traps to capture monsters without harming them.
  • Develop techniques to communicate and understand magical creatures.
  • Care for, treat, and preserve rare or endangered species.
  • Discover and research new species of magical life.

Technology Faction

dialogue.name: Alley
dialogue.text: Every dream is a driving force! Every mistake is just an experiment bringing you one step closer to success!

dialogue.name: Alley
dialogue.text: So go on, smile at your mistakes.

Alley, Tech Master
A tiny inventor who loves acting like “everyone’s big sister” (even though she actually is quite old).

Cheerful and supportive, she constantly encourages others.

She loves experimenting just as much as she loves gambling. Her catchphrase, whether a machine is about to explode or she’s about to place a bet, is: “Let me try it one more tiiime!”

Quest: To help the guild, choose one of the options below to draw or write.

  • Build structures and facilities for Seekers.
  • Create tools and devices used in Seeker missions.
  • Research ways to integrate magical crystals with technology.
  • Study Puff Kingdom’s magical mechanisms, crystal systems, and enhance the Keystone.
  • Design natural disaster defence systems and city security networks.
  • Mine rare minerals, gems, and other valuable resources.

Strategy Faction

dialogue.name: Varin
dialogue.text: Maps tell us where we “stand”… and one day, we’ll uncover every secret this world is hiding.

Varin, Strategy Master
A hard-to-approach Seeker with a sharp tongue and a harsh personality, yet unmatched skill in mapmaking and reading terrain as if blessed with “divine sight.” He frequently butts heads with the Guild Master… and loses every time.

His only redeeming trait is that he never hesitates to share his knowledge honestly and directly.

He joined the Seeker Guild for an unexpected reason: “There are plenty of people here I can put to work.”

Quest: To help the guild, choose one of the options below to draw or write.

  • Study history, ancient languages, and magical scripts.
  • Decode spells, curses, and ancient magic.
  • Plan Seeker missions and manage guild databases.
  • Create maps, forecast disasters, and oversee city resources.
  • Act as coordinators between guilds during emergencies.
  • Seek out ancient legends, lost magic, and hidden knowledge.

Culinary Faction

dialogue.name: Bronn
dialogue.text: I wonder what a Puffling tastes like—

dialogue.name: Bronn
dialogue.text: Oh? Not funny? Aw…

dialogue.name: Bronn
dialogue.text: Just kidding! Haha—BONK!! Ow!! Hey!!

Bronn, Culinary Master
A giant of a man and a master of all things delicious. Rumour has it that he carries the blood of man-eating giants. Though he appears gentle and warm, he’s far more terrifying than he looks.

He became a Seeker to discover new ingredients on his travels—and everyone can only hope he isn’t interested in tasting “dragon meat.

Quest: To help the guild, choose one of the options below to draw or write.

  • Prepare and provide meals for Seekers.
  • Research new ingredients with magical properties.
  • Handle banquet and festival preparations.
  • Create new recipes for guild requests or special missions.
  • Study Puffling diets and food preferences.
  • Explore and gather new or rare ingredients.
